content:
I'm happy to help you with that!

You can cancel your Entertainment Weekly subscription online or by phone. Here are the contact details:

**Online Cancellation:**

1. Go to [www.ew.com/service](http://www.ew.com/service)
2. Click on "Manage My Account"
3. Log in to your account using your email address and password
4. Click on "Cancel Subscription" and follow the prompts

**Phone Cancellation:**

1. Call Entertainment Weekly's customer service at 1-800-828-6882 (Monday-Friday, 8am-9pm ET)
2. Have your account number or subscription address ready
3. Let the representative know you'd like to cancel your subscription

**Email Cancellation:**

1. Email [ewcustserv@cdsfulfillment.com](mailto:ewcustserv@cdsfulfillment.com)
2. Include your name, address, and account number (if you have it)
3. State that you'd like to cancel your subscription

Make sure to have your account information handy, as you'll need it to process the cancellation.

Once you've canceled your subscription, you can move on to sorting through your other magazines using the steps I mentioned earlier.

Let me know if you have any other questions or need further assistance!
